feature: Add ARIA labels and keyboard navigation to MachineCard interactive elements
description: Add proper accessibility attributes (aria-label, aria-expanded, aria-haspopup) to all interactive elements in MachineCard including failover dropdown, backup info popup, and action buttons. Implement keyboard navigation support for nested dropdown menus.

phases.name: Add ARIA labels to action buttons
phases.description: Add aria-label attributes to all action buttons in MachineCard for screen reader support

subtasks.title: Add aria-labels to main action buttons
subtasks.description: Add aria-label to Start, Pause, Destroy, CPU migration, Failover, and Testar buttons. These buttons use icons and short text that may not fully convey their purpose to screen readers.
acceptance_criteria: Start button has aria-label 'Iniciar máquina {gpuName}'
Pause button has aria-label 'Pausar máquina {gpuName}'
CPU migration button has aria-label 'Migrar para CPU'
Failover button has aria-label 'Configurar failover'
Testar button has aria-label 'Simular failover'
subtasks.notes: Added aria-labels to all main action buttons: Start (Iniciar máquina {gpuName}), Pause (Pausar máquina {gpuName}), CPU migration (Migrar para CPU), GPU migration (Migrar para GPU), Failover (Configurar failover), and Testar (Simular failover).

subtasks.title: Add aria-labels to IDE buttons
subtasks.description: Add aria-label to VS Code dropdown, Cursor, and Windsurf buttons to clarify their purpose for screen readers.
acceptance_criteria: VS Code button has aria-label 'Abrir VS Code' and aria-haspopup='menu'
Cursor button has aria-label 'Abrir Cursor IDE'
Windsurf button has aria-label 'Abrir Windsurf IDE'
subtasks.notes: Added aria-labels to all IDE buttons: VS Code button has aria-label='Abrir VS Code' and aria-haspopup='menu', Cursor button has aria-label='Abrir Cursor IDE', Windsurf button has aria-label='Abrir Windsurf IDE'.

subtasks.title: Add aria-label to main menu trigger (MoreVertical)
subtasks.description: Add aria-label and aria-haspopup to the main dropdown menu trigger button.
acceptance_criteria: MoreVertical button has aria-label 'Menu de opções da máquina'
Button has aria-haspopup='menu'
subtasks.notes: Added aria-label='Menu de opções da máquina' and aria-haspopup='menu' to the MoreVertical dropdown trigger button.

phases.name: Add ARIA attributes to failover strategy dropdown
phases.description: Enhance the custom failover strategy dropdown with proper ARIA attributes for accessibility

subtasks.title: Add aria-expanded and aria-haspopup to failover trigger
subtasks.description: Add aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, and aria-label to the failover strategy badge/button that opens the dropdown.
acceptance_criteria: Failover trigger has aria-haspopup='menu'
Failover trigger has aria-expanded bound to showStrategyMenu state
Failover trigger has aria-label 'Estratégia de failover: {currentStrategy}'
subtasks.notes: Added aria-haspopup="menu", aria-expanded bound to showStrategyMenu state, and aria-label with "Estratégia de failover: {currentStrategy}" to the failover strategy dropdown trigger button.

subtasks.title: Add role and aria attributes to failover dropdown menu
subtasks.description: Add role='menu' to the dropdown container and role='menuitem' to each strategy option.
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown container has role='menu'
Dropdown has aria-label='Opções de estratégia de failover'
Each strategy option has role='menuitem'
Close button has aria-label='Fechar menu de failover'

subtasks.title: Add keyboard navigation to failover dropdown
subtasks.description: Implement arrow key navigation, Enter to select, and Escape to close for the failover dropdown.
acceptance_criteria: Escape key closes the dropdown
Arrow Up/Down navigates between options
Enter key selects the focused option
Tab key moves focus correctly
Focus is trapped within dropdown when open

phases.name: Add ARIA attributes to backup info popup
phases.description: Enhance the backup info badge/popup with proper ARIA attributes

subtasks.title: Add aria-expanded and aria-label to backup badge
subtasks.description: Add aria-expanded and aria-label to the Backup/Sem backup badge that opens the info popup.
acceptance_criteria: Badge has role='button'
Badge has aria-expanded bound to showBackupInfo state
Badge has aria-label 'Informações de backup: {status}'

subtasks.title: Add aria-label to backup popup close button
subtasks.description: Add aria-label to the close button in the backup info popup.
acceptance_criteria: Close button has aria-label='Fechar informações de backup'

subtasks.title: Add keyboard support to backup popup
subtasks.description: Add Escape key to close the backup info popup.
acceptance_criteria: Escape key closes the popup
Focus returns to trigger badge after closing

phases.name: Add ARIA attributes to copy buttons and specs
phases.description: Add aria-labels to copy buttons for IP, SSH, and other copyable content

subtasks.title: Add aria-labels to copy buttons
subtasks.description: Add aria-labels to the IP copy button, SSH copy button, and SSH config copy button in the dropdown menu.
acceptance_criteria: IP copy button has aria-label 'Copiar endereço IP'
SSH copy button has aria-label 'Copiar comando SSH'
SSH Config menu item has descriptive text for screen readers

subtasks.title: Add aria-live for copy feedback
subtasks.description: Add aria-live region to announce when content is copied to clipboard.
acceptance_criteria: Screen reader announces 'Copiado!' when content is copied
Uses aria-live='polite' for non-intrusive announcements

phases.name: Enhance DropdownMenu component with ARIA
phases.description: Improve the tailadmin-ui DropdownMenu component with proper ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation

subtasks.title: Add ARIA attributes to DropdownMenu components
subtasks.description: Add aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role='menu', and role='menuitem' to DropdownMenu components.
acceptance_criteria: DropdownMenuTrigger has aria-expanded bound to open state
DropdownMenuTrigger has aria-haspopup='menu'
DropdownMenuContent has role='menu'
DropdownMenuItem has role='menuitem'

subtasks.title: Add keyboard navigation to DropdownMenu
subtasks.description: Implement arrow key navigation, Enter to activate, and Escape to close for DropdownMenu.
acceptance_criteria: Escape key closes the dropdown
Arrow Up/Down navigates between menu items
Enter/Space activates the focused menu item
Home/End keys go to first/last item

phases.name: Add accessible status indicators
phases.description: Ensure status badges and loading states are accessible to screen readers

subtasks.title: Add aria-label to status badge
subtasks.description: Add aria-label to the machine status badge to convey status information.
acceptance_criteria: Status badge has aria-label 'Status da máquina: {status}'
Loading states include aria-busy='true'

subtasks.title: Add aria-live to failover progress panel
subtasks.description: Add aria-live region to the failover progress panel so screen readers announce progress updates.
acceptance_criteria: Failover progress panel has aria-live='polite'
Step changes are announced to screen readers
Completion is announced

phases.name: Testing and validation
phases.description: Test all accessibility improvements and ensure they work correctly

subtasks.title: Create accessibility tests
subtasks.description: Add tests to verify ARIA attributes and keyboard navigation work correctly.
acceptance_criteria: Test that all buttons have aria-labels
Test that dropdowns have proper ARIA attributes
Test that keyboard navigation works
Test that focus management is correct

subtasks.title: Manual screen reader testing
subtasks.description: Test the component manually with a screen reader to verify accessibility.
acceptance_criteria: All interactive elements are announced correctly
Navigation order makes sense
Status changes are announced
Error messages are accessible

final_acceptance: All interactive elements have appropriate ARIA labels
Dropdowns and popups have proper aria-expanded and aria-haspopup attributes
Keyboard navigation works for all dropdown menus
Screen readers can navigate and understand all machine card functionality
Focus management is correct for all modal/popup interactions
